entries.title_d: Members of the Bothan Spynet have captured several engineer transports and are attempting to fly them out of the system. These transport contain some very important information that cannot be allowed to fall into Rebel hands. Capture and return your targetted transport before it can escape the system.
entries.title: Endor System: Capture Bothan Controlled Engineer Transport
entries.thanks_5: Keep a close eye out. I am sure there are more out there.
entries.thanks_4: The Bothan dogs and their allies are no match for the might of the Empire.
entries.thanks_2: It looks like the Bothans' friend were not up to the challenge.
entries.thanks_1: Good work, pilot. The Rebels will think twice about attacking again.
entries.taunt_5: Move in! We must recapture that transport!
entries.taunt_4: You cannot hide the truth forever.
entries.taunt_3: You are going to pay for that!
entries.taunt_2: What are you planning out here, Imperial dog?
entries.taunt_1: Release the transport back into our control.
entries.target_disabled: The transport's engines are offline. Quickly start the docking procedure.
entries.split_quest_alert: Several transports are still under Bothan control. You are needed to recover another one before it gets away.
entries.recovery_success: Nice work, pilot. The transport is back safely in Imperial space.
entries.quest_recover_d: Once the transport is disabled, move in close and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Endor system and recover the transports stolen by the Bothans. The Bothan's are attempting to leave the system. Capture this vessel before it can do so.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the transport back to Imperial controlled space. The Inquisition will question the spy and find out more about their plan.
entries.quest_disable_d: Intercept and disable the transport before it can leave the system.
entries.panic_4: Rebels! The Bothans and them have to be working together.
entries.panic_3: I knew it! The Bothans must have been working for the Rebels.
entries.panic_2: The Bothans had some support vessels in the area.
entries.panic_1: It looks like the Bothan spies had some help.
entries.failed_escape: You let the Bothans escape with our transport! Report you disgrace to your superior.
entries.failed_destroy: We wanted that transport back in one piece. Report your failure to your superior immediately.
entries.complete: The transport is safely in Imperial hands.
entries.capture_phase_2: We almost have it. We should be under way shortly.
entries.capture_phase_1: We have taken back control of the transport from the Bothans. Attempting to get engines back online.
entries.capture_complete: Transport is back in Imperial control. Escort it back to headquarters.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have a lock. Sending the location to your nav computer. Capture that transport and return it to headquarters.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Scanning system for jump location. Once we have the location, proceed to that area, engage, and disable the transport.
entries.angry_disable: Imperial dog! You are making a big mistake. I suggest you leave now before you regret it forever.
entries.abort: We are at the mercy of our enemies out here. Why are you leaving?
